"Phantom Class Aptitude Test III":
"This is a test to judge whether an ARKS
is suitable for the Phantom class. This will
allow you to bypass the ability restriction.
By achieving the stated objective, even
further improvement is possible.


※Defeat Lv.1+ enemies by using Katanas,
Rifles and Rods as a Phantom.
※Phantom's level cap increases to 70."
